Tl;dr Travel

A collection of interactive, short-form travel guides to help simplify your trip planning

We provide starting points on topics we think you'd find useful, written as concisely as possible.

All guides are based on our travel experiences, curated from what we enjoyed during our time in the places.

These guides are meant to help you start your trip planning; not intended to be comprehensive.

Travel Guides

  • Nicaragua
  • Peru

Is there something you want missing? Make an issue or pull request on Github!
